name: Loony lips (avi_75)
description:
This game is based on madl ibs  basicly a text game 

This game consists of 10 stories so far more will be coming next week 

  • Each story will end up different depending on what you type in the box
  • There is a default resolution but sometimes you may have to enter full screen to click on the next button (I will try to fix it)
  • there are some Grammar mistakes which will be fixed in the next patch update
  • please comment if you find any bugs 
  • If you have any story ideas please comment down below  I would love to add them to my game 
  • download both files and play the game along with the pck file
